title: 50 Cent on Pornography, Interracial Dating, & Penis Candy - The People vs 50 Cent
content:
To celebrate the release of his new album Street King Immortal, we invited New York rapper, actor and entrepreneur 50 Cent to take on his Youtube commenters. 
     
We sit down with our pal Rocky as he answers commenters about his video for "L$D." 
     
First in a new series of The People vs - Ice Cube represents NWA to respond to some of the comments left on Youtube about the "Straight Outta Compton" music video. 
     
Here's the trailer for Season 2 featuring Kendrick Lamar, 50 Cent, Vince Staples, A$AP Rocky, Stormzy, NWA and Migos. 
     
We asked Raekwon to respond to some of the comments left on Youtube about his music video for "Ice Cream". 
     
We asked Dej Loaf to respond to some of the comments left on Youtube about her music video for “Try Me”. 
     
We asked Wiz Khalifa to respond to some of the comments left on Youtube about his music video for “We Dem Boyz”
